page.title: 01South Pembs Golf Club.
page.content: The South Pembs Golf Club has been in existence for 20 years.It is a 9 hole course sited on the Barrack Hill,the clubhouse is in the old Defensible Barracks.It was built here because it was the only open space available at the time.Golf is played in all weather except the snow but as the Barrack Hill is so exposed it is not very pleasant on some days.The joining fee is Â£50 and the membership fee Â£125 per annum.Children and students have free membership.Most people carry a golf bag but some use a trolley and in it usually carry 3 woods,9 irons and a putter.For most people golf is a very relaxing game though many find it difficult to play.However, because of the handicap system,players of totally different standards can enjoy a competetive game.
